effect: $[{ name: '废料增益', type: ' \cdot ', value: 2 }, { name: '废料容量', type: ' \cdot ', value: 2 }]$

${ if (lvl === 2) { return [{ name: '怪物零件容量', type: 'bonus', value: 1e12 }, { name: '部落卡片容量', type: '+', value: 1 }]; } return [{ name: '怪物零件容量', type: 'bonus', value: 1e4 }, { name: '部落卡片容量', type: '+', value: 1 }]; }$
glyph: ${ if (lvl === 2) { return { 尖刺: 2, 梦: 3, 三叶草: 3 }; } return { 尖刺: 1, 梦: 2, 三叶草: 2 }; }$

effect: ${ if (lvl === 2) { return [{ name: '宝藏插槽', type: '+', value: 12 }]; } return [{ name: '宝藏插槽', type: '+', value: 8 }]; }$
glyph: ${ if (lvl === 2) { return { 金币: 5 }; } return { 金币: 3 }; }$

effect: $[{ name: '材料增益', type: ' \cdot ', value: 2 }, { name: '产出', type: ' \cdot ', value: 2 }]$
$[{ name: '韧性', type: ' \cdot ', value: 0.5 }, { name: '腐败', type: 'bonus', value: -0.5 }]$
$[{ name: '形状增益', type: ' \cdot ', value: 4 }, { name: '特殊形状几率', type: '+', value: 0.005 }]$
激活的卡片: {"cost":{"最高力量":1},"params":"$[\\text{向下取整}(Math.min(store.state.currency.动机.value, GALLERY_SHAPES_AUTOCOLLECT_MAX) / 10)]$","description":"$[formatInt(params[0])]$","formula":"$[formatInt(params[0]  \\cdot  10), formatInt(GALLERY_SHAPES_AUTOCOLLECT_MAX), formatInt(params[0])]$","disabled":"$store.state.cryolab.gallery.激活的卡片 || params[0] <= 0$","trigger":"${ for (const [key, elem] of Object.entries(store.state.gallery.shape)) { if (elem.unlocked && !elem.isSpecial) { store.dispatch('currency/gain', { feature: 'gallery', name: key, gainMult: true, amount: params[0] }, { root: true }); } } store.commit('stat/add', { feature: 'gallery', name: '收藏家', value: params[0] }, { root: true }); store.dispatch('currency/spend', { feature: 'gallery', name: '动机', amount: params[0]  \\cdot  10 }, { root: true }); }$"}
